content:
[explain]
攻击时，有7%%的机率使自身增加7点力量、体力、智力和精神，效果持续7秒。

[if]
    [cooltime]
        12000
    [attack success]
        1
[/if]

[then]
    [target]
        `myself`    -1
    [duration]
        7000
    [probability]
        7
    [stat]
        `physical attack`
        `+`    7
    [stat]
        `physical defense`
        `+`    7
    [stat]
        `magical attack`
        `+`    7
    [stat]
        `magical defense`
        `+`    7
[/then]
